AdditionalNotes.value: Recommended starting dose for patients with Multiple Myeloma with Creatinine Clearance 30 to 60 mL/minute.
Recommended starting dose for patients with Multiple Myeloma with Creatinine Clearance less than 30 mL/minute not requiring dialysis.
Recommended starting dose for Myelodysplatic Syndrome patients with creatinine clearance 30 to 60 mL/minute.
Recommended starting dose for Myelodysplastic Syndrome patients with creatinine clearance less than 30 mL/minute not requiring dialysis.
Recommended starting dose for Myelodysplastic Syndrome patients with creatinine clearance less than 30 mL/minute requiring dialysis.
